## CCSelectorCombinedProps.gridSelectorProps property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Props passed to the MUI Grid item component that the selector component is wrapped in, if the country code components are wrapped in a Grid. Overwrites the `gridItemProps`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
gridSelectorProps?: GridItemProps;
```
